Description:
Beautifully Renovated Double Fronted Victorian
This stunning home has been meticulously renovated to the highest standard. Retaining its period charm whilst offering modern convenience and comfortable living. Featuring a classic entry with high ceilings, hardwood flooring and a gorgeous kitchen with 900mm oven and ample bench space. The spacious open plan living and dining offers an abundance of light-filled living space which opens onto a large timber deck, ideal for entertaining. The three large bedrooms offer ample accommodation and are serviced by a wonderful two-way bathroom/ensuite with floor to ceiling tiles and large w/in robe. The home also has ducted heating, evaporative cooling, separate laundry, second toilet and a cast iron fireplace. The rear street access is ideal for two to three vehicles, perfect for the car enthusiast or tradesman. The huge garage also offers a separate rumpus room/study which is perfect for teenagers, a home office or second living area. Located in the sought-after river end of Belmont, this wonderful home is just a short walk to High Street Shopping Strip, cafes, local schools, Geelong CBD and the Barwon River.
View the auction via live stream at the link below
https://auctionnow.com.au/properties/62041
- Quiet location close to shopping, cafes, restaurants and Barwon River.
- Fully renovated, re-stumped, re-plumbed, re-wired and re-roofed.
- Rear street access to a large garage for two-three cars plus rumpus/studio room.
- Stunning façade with Victorian features established gardens and new decking.
- Tall ceilings, hardwood flooring, ducted heating, evaporative cooling.
- Gorgeous two-way bathroom/ensuite, two separate toilets and laundry.
- Large open plan kitchen dining and living opening onto a large entertaining deck.
- Secure and private back yard ideal for pets and children.
- Move in and enjoy this wonderful lifestyle location of river end Belmont.
- Close to the Geelong CBD, South Geelong Train Station the Barwon River.
Insights: 30 Seaview Parade, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 182 other 3 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Stylish Living on Single Level
This immaculately presented 4 bedroom home is perfect for those looking for an easy to maintain home with handy access to the city and a choice of shopping centres. The open plan living has a warm northerly aspect with beautiful polished floorboards, zoned kitchen meals with stone bench tops, induction hot plates plus dishwasher. Other features include double glazed windows, central heating, double blinds, vac system, solar hot water, main bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, two way into the main bathroom is ideal for guests. The double garage has through access to the wonderful landscaped garden with paved patio and alfresco entertaining areas. This could be the home you have been waiting for.

Description:
Hidden Gem in Blue Chip Belmont!
Perfectly situated in a quiet and convenient location, this charming minors cottage has been painstakingly restored and now awaits a new owner. Literally walking distance to High Street Shopping strip, Barwon River, local parks & schools and only a short drive to Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Deakin Uni, Epworth Hospital and Geelong Ring road, this is a rare opportunity to secure your own piece of Blue Chip Belmont.
The original character of the home has been exceptionally maintained, while it has been updated and restored over the past few years. The renovations include re-stumping, new roof, new floor boards, new window shutters, ducted heating and RC A/C and an upgraded kitchen and bathroom which have helped to give the home a more comfortable, contemporary feel.
There are 2 good sized bedrooms at the front of the home both with BIR, the hallway then leads to an open area featuring 2 living/dining spaces one with original brick fire-place. One of these rooms could easily be converted into a 3rd bedroom, instantly adding value. From here you enter the rear part of the home which is a light filled space with upgraded kitchen and another living/dining area and the central bathroom featuring shower, vanity and toilet. From here attractive French doors open out to the private paved courtyard featuring a pergola, external laundry and additional toilet and offers plenty of scope to renovate or extend further. There is large carport and garage with room for small workshop or studio.
With features including polished timber floorboards, high ceilings, gas ducted & wall heating, reverse cycle AC, window shutters throughout, this is your chance to secure a home or investment in one of Belmonts best locations.
Insights: 8 Church Street, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 40 other 2 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Quality and Sophistication in Premier Belmont
Quietly nestled away yet only moments from all the action of High Street, Highton Shopping Village and just a short walk to the iconic Barwon River. This brand new home sitting on its own title has been built with a strong attention to detail and presents itself perfectly for those looking to downsize or want a low maintenance lifestyle.
Certain to impress upon entry is the stunning kitchen complete with high level finishes including stone bench tops, pendant lighting and quality appliances. This overlooks the family dining. You will enjoy the luxury of having two living spaces, a sitting area adjacent to the dining and a generous formal lounge that can be closed off with double sliding doors if you so desire.This whole section of the home is filled with so much natural light.
The transition to outside is seamless where you will embrace an expansive entertaining deck stepping down to a private and spacious backyard with scope to build a pergola if you desire (STCA).
Completing the home is three well-sized bedrooms all with BIRs, large master with its own ensuite and WIR. There is also the clever addition of a separate study/ home office.
Features:
Remote DLUG
Ducted heating
Timber floors
Landscaped gardens
Custom bathroom bench tops
Insights: 8b Morris Street, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 182 other 3 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
High Spec in Blue Chip Belmont
This beautiful brand new Townhouse in Belmonts coveted river precinct on its own block epitomises city living and is in a class of its own. You will fall in love with the open living area and north facing elevated deck affording expansive city views as well as living in a home where the evidence of the quality build is apparent upon entry.
Some of the many features include:
-vaulted ceiling with skylights in the living and kitchen giving a wonderful feeling of space and light
-thoughtful custom design for easy living
-central heating, air cond and polished timber floors
-large double garage with rear street access and remote door
-enclosed Courtyard/backyard area and under house storage
-3 bedrooms, master with ens and WIR
You can easily access the high street shops/supermarket or take a short stroll to the river or into the CBD itself. If you dont want to compromise on quality, location or size this, well proportioned (20sq) townhouse is the one for you and will make you the envy of your friends.

Description:
Tasteful Renovation in a Premium Location
Situated on the doorstep of some of Geelong's greatest education, sporting and shopping precincts sits this classic home with a loving renovation. Whether you're searching for your first home, family home or investment, this charming renovated take on a 1970's home will be sure to impress. Set on a generous 630sqm approx. allotment in a quiet street, you can enjoy all the comforts the home has to offer, right on the doorstep of Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Deakin University and state of the art sporting facilities.
The interior features hardwood flooring to the kitchen and living areas as well as gas heating and much more. The front and rear features established, low maintenance gardens, entertainer's alfresco and side access to the large double garage. All of this plus much more is sure to impress upon inspection.
- Three spacious bedrooms, master with walk-in robes
- Spare bedrooms feature built-in robes
- Fantastic access for natural sunlight
- Neutral colours and tones have been used throughout
- Established, low maintenance gardens with large double garage
- Expansive rear yard, perfect for kids and pets to play
- Five minutes from Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre
- Five minutes to Deakin University, Primary and Secondary Schools
- 15 minutes to Geelong CBD, Waterfront and Botanical Gardens

Description:
Original Family Home in Immaculate Condition Deceased Estate
Situated on a large allotment of approx.736sqm in the heart of a popular locale of Grovedale, this sizeable family home has been lovingly maintained and offers the astute purchaser the opportunity to capitalize on the great potential here on offer.
Ideal for young families, first home buyers and investors, this original brick home presents great potential for a range of situations, with generous dimensions throughout.
Affordable homes in this quality of condition are a rare find. Being perfectly located for convenience on the doorstep of all amenities including schools, sporting facilities and shopping centres makes this home a must inspect.
- Dual spacious family living areas
- Three bedrooms with built-in robes plus additional study
- Central heating throughout plus gas heating units in both livings
- Enclosed outdoor pergola
- Well-appointed central bathroom and separate master ensuite
- 736sqm allotment
- Spacious and secure north-facing yard
- Substantial off-street parking
- Walking distance to Waurn Ponds shopping centre
- Close proximity to schooling and recreation facilities

Description:
Room For The Whole Family
Positioned in a quiet court location this family home on over 900sqm of prime Highton land is an opportunity not to be missed. As you enter the home youre greeted by high ceilings and generous rooms, creating a feeling of space within the home. The home offers three living areas, somewhere for the whole family. All 4 bedrooms are generous in size and include BIRs, all serviced by the central bathroom while the master includes updated ensuite and WIR. The dining area is surrounded by bay windows looking out onto the established gardens, while the kitchen offers gas cooktop, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and ample cupboard and bench space. Year round comforts include central heating, wood heater, reverse cycle air conditioning, ceiling fans plus 18 solar panels. Impressive manicured gardens and undercover alfresco area finish off this home perfectly and provide the perfect space for the entertainer. The kids will love the backgate access to Christian College, with sporting ground facilities at your backdoor, giving your family more space to play than they could imagine. Offering plenty of storage throughout, including attic ladder to roof, garden shed, remote DLUG with internal access and rear roller door plus double carport. Freshly painted throughout and located close to schools, public transport and a short drive to the Waurn Ponds shopping Centre. Bring the family today!
Insights: 7 Percy Jones Court, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 108 other 4 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Your Dream Family Lifestyle Starts Here
If youre looking for a home that ticks every box, then look no further! Featuring updated interiors, a spacious backyard, and an oversized double garage with workshop, every inch of this property will delight!
With everything you could possibly need within walking distance, locations dont get much better than this. Public transport is footsteps from your front door, while a short stroll will find you at the popular Rolling Pin Bakery or Gateway Plaza. The whole family will be inspired to venture outdoors with both local sporting grounds and the Gateway Sanctuary moments away. To top it all off, Leopold Primary School is within easy reach, along with the Leopold Community Hub and Leopold Library.
Showcasing a cathedral ceiling with highlight windows, the expansive living zone will quickly become your favourite room in the whole house. The large bookcase makes a stylish statement, while sliding doors open onto the lush backyard. An abundance of natural light makes this an enticing setting all year round, with a wood heater creating a cosy ambience during the cooler months. The open plan kitchen/dining zone flows onto the sheltered alfresco, which sets the scene for casual outdoor living and provides effortless entertaining options. The kitchen features clean-lined cabinetry, a built-in pantry, and stainless steel appliances (Bosch dishwasher and Emilia oven, gas cooktop, rangehood).
The generous Master Bedroom creates a relaxing oasis for parents with a walk-in robe and en suite with floor-to-ceiling tiling. Three additional bedrooms feature built-in robes, with one bedroom boasting direct access to the main bathroom. The separate toilet and laundry complete the layout. Modcons include evaporative cooling, a split-system air conditioner, and Foxtel connection.
The north-facing backyard creates a wealth of space for children and pets to play freely. The remote lock-up garage accommodates two vehicles plus a large workshop making this an ideal choice for tradies and DIY-lovers! The rear roller door provides backyard vehicle access, with dedicated storage behind the house for a caravan or trailer.
With so much to offer, an inspection of this beautiful property is a must! Enquire today!
Insights: 33 Warrawee Road, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 94 other 4 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Ideal First Home or Investment Property
With the space and size of a 2-bedroom unit for the price of 1, this conveniently located unit flexibly lends itself ideally for first home buyers or downsizers, however also doubles as a lucrative investment property for the savvy investor.
Whilst the property is easily ready to move in and enjoy, there is still scope for some TLC to make it your own. Comprising;
Light-filled kitchen and dining with new timber-look vinyl flooring
Open living space with ceiling fan
Spacious bedroom with large BIR, tv point & data points
Handy study nook with built-in-desk & cupboards or large WIP
Single remote garage with rear courtyard access, plus additional single carport
Extras include; electric wall heaters, dishwasher, Foxtel connection, private courtyard, s
store-room and freshly painted
Within walking distance to all your major amenities, there arguably isnt a more resourceful location in Geelong.
At Wilsons we are conscious of playing our part in reducing the spread of COVID-19. We will therefore be conducting our property inspections using best practice sanitary measures to ensure everyone's safety. We can also arrange a virtual tour of the home if that better suits. Contact us today.

Description:
Excellent Family Home on 867sqm (approx.)
This striking family home underpinned by a massive allotment is only moments from all the action of High Street shopping precinct, Barwon River and within walking distance to Belmont Primary and Secondary Schools. The home offers the perfect blend of character and modern comforts combined with space. An exciting opportunity for the growing family, you can move in with absolute ease but there is also scope for you to add value in the future.
The generous floor plan begins with the separate formal lounge as you enter boasting an electric fireplace for great ambience. Step through from here to the heart of the home being the open plan kitchen, dining and large family living area filled with natural light. The kitchen offers modern appliances, walk-in pantry and plenty of bench space.
The transition to outside is seamless through French doors onto the fantastic entertaining deck where you will enjoy many family gatherings. This flows down to the massive backyard lending itself for you to extend the home, build a shed, or put in a pool (STCA). There is room to do all three at once!
Completing the home is four well-sized bedrooms with BIRs, the master complete with ensuite. The main bathroom is centrally positioned to comfortably service the remainder of the home.
The property is also zoned RGZ (Residential Growth Zone) Schedule 2. This opens up future possibilities to re-develop (STCA) if you so desire.
Features:
Ducted heating
Split system A/C
Ceiling Fans
Updated kitchen appliances
Off-street parking for multiple cars
Terms: 10% deposit, settlement 60 days.

Description:
Stunning Renovation, Magnificent Entertainer
There is nothing left to do and everything to love in this immaculate renovation in the heart of Grovedale. Finished to perfection, this home has been tastefully updated and thoughtfully designed to present a flawless plan for living and entertaining in comfort and style.
On entry, the floating floors coupled with the fresh white walls provides a warmth and light that beckons you in to this beautiful house. Upstairs the generous master bedroom includes a WIR and a beautifully finished ensuite providing a feeling of luxury and escape from the rest of the household. The remaining bedrooms are fitted with BIR's and are well serviced by the large family bathroom complete with soaking tub!
The stunning open-plan kitchen/dining/living is spacious, light and fitted out perfectly for family living. The beautiful kitchen includes Caesarstone benches, servery window, perfect for entertaining and is complemented by an abundance of cupboards and pantry space. The living area is open yet cosy in design and the gas log fire will have you looking forward to the upcoming cold Winter nights.
There are just as many features outside as there are inside at this spectacular property. Three entertaining zones is excellent for entertaining, the undercover alfresco area featuring spotted gum decking overlooks a great size backyard with plenty of space for the kids to play. The converted double garage is ideal as a gym, studio or work shop space.
Remote double garage with security entrance and roll-through at rear, approx 676sqm block, luxury bathrooms, stunning colour scheme and beautiful fittings make this property an absolute
stand-out.
This home will have you at hello. Inspect and fall in love.
Insights: 2 Torres Court, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 143 other 3 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
Your slice of leafy Highton.
This gorgeous home provides outstanding value and is perfectly positioned on an excellent allotment of 586sqm (approx.) and provides an ideal opportunity for first home buyers or investors looking to expand their portfolio. Presented neatly inside and showcasing polished hardwood floors that flow throughout. Good sized family room offers plenty of natural light and space, whilst meals area adjoins functional kitchen with plenty of bench space. Three great sized bedrooms with built in robes, accompanied by the neat and tidy bathroom and separate laundry. The private north facing backyard, is what everyone is looking for. Surrounded by established maple trees and gardens, this impeccable grassed yard is ideal for entertaining friends and family.
Features include storage shed, window shutters, ducting heating and split system in the living area. Situated in a very sought after locale, less than 100m away from Bellaire Primary School, plus just minutes to the Highton Village, local sporting grounds, Deakin University, Epworth Hospital and all public conveniences.
Insights: 12 Kennedy Grove, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 138 other 3 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.
